comments:
1. Import org.eclipse.ui.win32 into your workspace.
2. Window->Preferences->Target Platform.  Select 'Not in Workspace'.
3. Right-click on the fragment in your workspace and select 'Update 
Classpath...'.
You will get the following null pointer exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.ui.BuildPathUtil.addFragmentPlugin
(BuildPathUtil.java:349)
	at org.eclipse.pde.ui.BuildPathUtil.setBuildPath(BuildPathUtil.java:156)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.UpdateClasspathAction.setProjectBuil
dpath(UpdateClasspathAction.java:143)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.UpdateClasspathAction.doUpdateClassp
ath(UpdateClasspathAction.java:127)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.UpdateClasspathAction.access$0
(UpdateClasspathAction.java:118)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.UpdateClasspathAction$2.run
(UpdateClasspathAction.java:92)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1361)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.UpdateClasspathAction$1.run
(UpdateClasspathAction.java:95)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
